description: This file defines API routes for authentication in a FastAPI application, including login and current user retrieval endpoints, with mock implementations for MVP.

classes.name: LoginRequest
classes.description: Pydantic model for login request containing email and password.

classes.name: LoginResponse
classes.description: Pydantic model for login response containing access token, token type, and user info.

classes.name: MeResponse
classes.description: Pydantic model for current user response containing user info.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Mock login endpoint that returns a token equal to the email and user info.

methods.name: get_me
methods.description: Endpoint to retrieve the current authenticated user based on token.
